text: Write partial data single Markdown file.

title: Export to Markdown — kindle_write_md
code: kindle_write_md(   data,   file,   title = NULL,   distinct = TRUE,   drop_na = TRUE,   new_line = TRUE,   time = TRUE )

title: Export to Markdown — kindle_write_md
text: data data read kindle_read(). file file name write , book title recommended. title String. Provide title data want write , support regular expressions. distinct Logical. TRUE, last record begin value retained; FALSE, records deleted. drop_na Logical. TRUE, drop rows text column NA; FALSE, records deleted. new_line Logical. TRUE,   replaced \n can create new line. time Logical. TRUE, datetime add end text.

title: Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx
code: kindle_write_xlsx(   data,   file,   columns = NULL,   distinct = TRUE,   drop_na = TRUE,   new_line = TRUE,   title = NULL )

title: Export to xlsx — kindle_write_xlsx
text: data data read kindle_read(). file file name write . columns character vector. Select reorder variables data frame. Choose following values: id: row number. title: Name book. page: number page excerpt book. begin: starting position excerpt book. end: ending position excerpt book. datetime: time excerpt took . text: Excerpted content. distinct Logical. TRUE, last record begin value retained; FALSE, records deleted. drop_na Logical. TRUE, drop rows text column NA; FALSE, records deleted. new_line Logical. TRUE,   replaced \n can create new line. title String. Provide title data want write , support regular expressions. NULL, records wrote .

title: Remove links and tags — remove_tag
text: Read Clipboard, remove [[, ]] #tag, widely used note taking tools like Roam Research write Clipboard .

title: Remove links and tags — remove_tag
code: Sys.setenv(CLIPR_ALLOW=TRUE) clipr::write_clip("A [[nice]] day. #happy", allow_non_interactive = TRUE) remove_tag() clipr::read_clip() #> [1] "A nice day.愀獢瑥\u0a00鼈缜ᤀ退改㌸改㙤戭㜱ⴵㄴ戲㤭㜳ⴶ㘰㈱㌵挸㡦捤"
